name: DUA
description:
Just a short platformer game where you control 2 character  mirroring each other movements at the same time and your goal is to reach the portal with these two character

This game is made to finish our final exam and this is the first time we make a game

Hope you enjoying it :)

❤ made with Godot Engine

❗ Select level menu is still disabled because of some issues

❗❕ Its name born from the two characters player are using, In Indonesia Two or 2 is called Dua, very self explanatory
